global.gdpr-info: I agree to receiving emails about my saved design, as well as the occasional piece of carefully curated content from <TENANT_NAME>. The data controller is Roomle GmbH. Your data will be processed in order to allow you to finish and save your design. The legal basis for the processing is your consent (art. 6(1)(a)(f) of the GDPR).

range.range-error: Value was not in the range of

addons.hint: Click on an element to position it in your configuration

ar.heading: View in room

hint.ios: Enter the following link into the browser of your iOS device
hint.android: Enter the following link into the browser of your Android device
hint.desktop: Enter the following link into the browser of your mobile device

ar.title: Show in your room (AR)
ar.description: You can use augmented reality on your smartphone or tablet, scan the QR code or open the link on your device.

landing-page.title: Beautiful! And now?
landing-page.description: Open this configuration in AR and see it directly in your room.

ar.not-available: It seems like your device is not capable of augmented reality. If you are viewing this web page within an in-app web view try to open it in your native browser. If you are on iOS you can also download the app to enable augmented reality.
ar.in-app: You are viewing the configurator in an in-app browser. If you encounter any problems please try to open the configurator in your native browser

no-docking.heading: Sorry, but adding is not possible
no-docking.desc: Please delete or change an existing element, or choose another element, which you want to add to the configuration

wrong-domain: Sorry but this configurator is not available on this domain

save-draft.title: Save draft
save-draft.description: We save your draft, so you can continue editing later.
save-draft.description-link: Your configuration is saved you can use the link to share it.

variants.desc: If you change to a different variant all your changes will be lost. Do you still want to continue

export-3d.title: Download 3D data
export-3d.description: Please select the file type you want to download
export-3d.error: Problems while exporting your file, please try again

no-active-package: Currently this configurator is not available

element-disabled.heading: Sorry, but this option is currently not possible
element-disabled.desc: The option you are trying to set is currently not possible try to choose another element or change the parameters of the configuration

cookies.info: This website uses cookies to give you a better service and to improve your experience. By continuing to browse the site you are agreeing to our use of cookies.
